entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain or light snow beginning after midnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain or periods of light snow in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow or rain late in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
